abstract: A claim set to be filed Monday says that the Walmart store closings were in retaliation for a history of labor activism at one of the shuttered stores.
snippet: A claim set to be filed Monday says that the Walmart store closings were in retaliation for a history of labor activism at one of the shuttered stores.
lead_paragraph: A group representing Walmart workers laid off after the abrupt closing of five stores last week planned to seek an injunction on Monday from the National Labor Relations Board that would require the retailer to rehire all 2,200 affected workers.

headline.main: Laid-Off Walmart Workers Head to Labor Board
headline.print_headline: Laid-Off Walmart Workers Head to Labor Board

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
